name: Animals VS Vampires
description:
Animals VS Vampires is an idle tapping game where you have to fight off the vampires with animals or with the force of tapping.

Criterion #1: Incremental game (Clicker/Idle game)

    You have to click your way to victory, with more money you can buy pets so you don't have to click anymore. 

Criterion #2: Vampires

    You have to fight off the vampires by clicking or using pets

Criterion #3: Pets

    You can use pets to make your life easier.

Credits:

Siddhartt#1871 Lead programmer, Design and art

GameFreak21#1956 Programmer

And Joshua McLean for the awesome music!
